title: Transformer
description:
Implementation of a transformer to reverse a sequence of numbers.
 Through a relatively simple problem, we examine the transformer architecture, which is the basis for the most advanced models in the field of natural language processing.

 Tools: Python, Pytorch, sklearn, optuna.

title: Neural Network Binary Classification
description:
Simple neural network for binary classification from scatch.

 Tools: Python, Pytorch, sklearn, pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, streamlit.

title: Movies List
description:
A web app that displays lists of movies. Allows users to add movies to their favorite list.

 Tools: 
Frontend: React, React-Redux, Axios, React-Roouter, Material UI, 
Backend: NodeJS, Express, Postgres, Sequelize, JSON Web Token, Bcrypt, Dotenv.

title: My Journal
description:
A CRUD app that allows user to write journal.

 Tools: 
Frontend: React, React-Redux, Axios, React-Roouter, React-Hook-Form, 
Backend: NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, Moongoose, JSON Web Token, Bcrypt, Dotenv, Jest, Supertest.

title: React Native Weather App
description:
An React Native app with three primary screens, each dedicated to different aspects of weather data display and interaction. Navigation utilizes Stack method. There are options to navigate among the screens on the top bar.

 Tools: Javascript, React Native, expo-location, expo-sqlite, react-native-paper.

title: Progressive Web App with React and Vite
description:
A To-do progressive web application implemented with React and vite-plugin-pwa.

 Tools: Javascript, React, dexie, vite-plugin-pwa.
